mapper.select: select gdsThumbImg, gdsCode, gdsName, cateName, gdsPrice from goods g, category c where g.cateCode = c.cateCode group by gdsCode
mapper.insert: insert into goods(gdsCode, gdsName, cateCode, gdsPrice, gdsDesc, gdsImg, gdsThumbImg, gdsDate, gdsView) values (#{gdsCode}, #{gdsName}, #{cateCode}, #{gdsPrice}, #{gdsDesc}, #{gdsImg}, #{gdsThumbImg}, SYSDATE(), 0)
mapper.update: update goods set gdsName = #{gdsName}, cateCode = #{cateCode}, gdsPrice = #{gdsPrice}, gdsDesc = #{gdsDesc}, gdsImg = #{gdsImg}, gdsThumbImg = #{gdsThumbImg}, gdsDate = SYSDATE() where gdsCode = #{gdsCode}
